title: Patchwork Quilting, 19th–20th century
creditline: Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell
description: Small white quilt with a checkered design in plaid squares and square with a printed rose pattern. Quilting is in a simple diamond design. Plain lining.

tombstone.epitaph:
Patchwork Quilting, 19th–20th century.
19th–20th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: quilted. Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell. 1956-181-347.
